column5: Premium location in the middle of the Super Bowl party corridor - This 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath, 4,900 square foot, fully furnished, mid century & industrial style home with downtown views, is located in one of the best areas of Houston for both nightlife, or family friendly entertainment.  Unique, 3-Story, Custom Built Single Family Home with Breathtaking up close views of Downtown Houston from 3 balconies, Theater Room, Pool Table, Custom Bar, Gated Parking & Ample Room for large gatherings.
column8: Huge Mid-Century Style Home Right Next to Downtown
